em&#123;font-style:normal;color:#4dd0e1;font-weight:700&#125;.markdown-body table&#123;display:inline-block!important;font-size:12px;width:auto;max-width:100%;overflow:auto;border:1px solid #f6f6f6&#125;.markdown-body thead&#123;background:#f6f6f6;color:#000;text-align:left&#125;.markdown-body tr:nth-child(2n)&#123;background-color:rgba(77,208,225,.05)&#125;.markdown-body td,.markdown-body th&#123;padding:12px 7px;line-height:24px&#125;.markdown-body td&#123;min-width:120px&#125;.markdown-body blockquote&#123;margin:2em 0;padding:24px 32px;border-left:4px solid #26c6da;background:rgba(77,208,225,.15);position:relative&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:before&#123;content:"❝";top:8px;left:8px;color:#4dd0e1;font-size:30px;line-height:1;font-weight:700;position:absolute;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body .task-list-item,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item&#123;list-style:none&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ul,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ul&#123;margin-top:0&#125;.markdown-body ol ol,.markdown-body ol ul,.markdown-body ul ol,.markdown-body ul ul&#123;margin-top:3px&#125;.markdown-body ol li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0"><code>Vuex</code>的基础知识</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">01. 基本概念</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-2">（1）是什么</h4>
<ul>
<li><code>Vuex</code>是专门为<code>Vue</code>服务的状态管理插件，用于管理页面的数据状态、提供统一数据操作的生态系统
<ul>
<li>相当于数据库<code>mongoDB</code>、<code>MySQL</code>等，任何组件都可以存取仓库中的数据</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><code>Vuex</code>采用MVC模式中的Model层，规定所有的数据必须通过<code>action--->mutaion--->state </code>这个流程来改变状态</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-3">（2）为什么</h4>
<ul>
<li>多个组件通过<code>Vuex</code>进行通信，降低耦合</li>
<li>方便维护，增强可读性</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-4">（3）怎么办</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>安装：<code>npm install vuex --save</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>新建：<code>src/store/index.js</code></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Vue <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vue'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Vuex <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vuex'</span>;
Vue.use(Vuex);
<span class="hljs-comment">//创建Vuex实例对象</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> store = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vuex.Store(&#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">state</span>:&#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">getters</span>:&#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">mutations</span>:&#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">actions</span>:&#123;&#125;
&#125;)
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> store;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>引入：在<code>main.js</code>中引入<code>Vuex</code></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> Vue <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vue'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> App <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./App.vue'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> store <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./store'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> vm = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vue(&#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">store</span>: store,
    <span class="hljs-attr">render</span>: <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">h</span> =></span> h(App)
&#125;).$mount(<span class="hljs-string">'#app'</span>) 
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">02. 5个核心属性</h3>
<h4 data-id="heading-6">（1）state</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>概念：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>Vuex</code>的核心，用于保存状态</li>
<li>存储在state中的状态只能通过<code>mutation</code>进行更改</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">state: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">state1</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">state2</span>: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>使用：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 方式一：访问 store 实例，获取该数据</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.$store.state.state1

<span class="hljs-comment">// 方式二：使用 mapState 辅助函数，将 state 混入 compouted 对象中</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; mapState &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vuex'</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">computed</span>: &#123;
    ...mapState([<span class="hljs-string">'state1'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'state2'</span>]) 
&#125;
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.state1 <span class="hljs-comment">// 使用方式同data属性、computed属性</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-7">（2）getters</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>概念：</p>
<ul>
<li><code>getters</code> 可以对State进行计算操作，它就是Store的计算属性</li>
<li><code>getters</code> 可以在多组件之间复用</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">getters: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 接收 state 作为第一个参数</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">getState1</span>(<span class="hljs-params">state</span>)</span>&#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> state.state1;
    &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 可以接受其他 getter 作为第二个参数</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">getState2</span>(<span class="hljs-params">state, getters</span>)</span>&#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> state.state2 + getters.getState1
    &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>使用</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 方式一</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.$store.getters.getState

<span class="hljs-comment">// 方式二：使用 mapGetters 辅助函数，将 getters 混入 compouted 对象中</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; mapGetters &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vuex'</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">computed</span>:&#123;
    ...mapGetters([<span class="hljs-string">'getState'</span>])
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 或者，指定别名</span>
  ...mapGetters(&#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">myGetters</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'getState1'</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 映射为自定义名称</span>
 &#125;)
&#125;
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.getState
<span class="hljs-comment">// 或者，通过别名访问</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.myGetters
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-8">（3）mutations</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>概念：</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>改变<code>Vuex</code>中的状态的唯一途径就是显式地提交 <code>commit</code> —— <code>mutation</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>mutation 必须是同步函数</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>mutation 可以有两个参数</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>第一个参数是 <code>state</code>，就是 <strong>store 的 state</strong></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>第二个参数是 <code>payload</code>，就是提交 mutation 的时候额外传入的<strong>参数</strong></p>
<blockquote>
<p>如果要传递的参数包含多个字段，这个<code>payload</code>应该是一个对象</p>
</blockquote>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">mutations: &#123;
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">CHANGE_STATE1</span>(<span class="hljs-params">state, newVal</span>)</span> &#123;
state.state1 = newVal
&#125;,
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">CHANGE_STATE2</span>(<span class="hljs-params">state, payload</span>)</span>&#123;
state.state2 += payload.num
&#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>使用：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 方式一：</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.$store.commit(<span class="hljs-string">'CHANGE_STATE1'</span>, newVal)
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.$store.commit(<span class="hljs-string">'CHANGE_STATE2'</span>, &#123; <span class="hljs-attr">count</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10</span> &#125;)

<span class="hljs-comment">// 方式二：使用 mapMutations 辅助函数，将 mutation 混入 methods 方法中</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; mapMutations &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vuex'</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">methods</span>: &#123;
  ...mapMutations([<span class="hljs-string">'CHANGE_STATE1'</span>])
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 或者，指定别名</span>
  ...mapMutations(&#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">myMutations</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'CHANGE_STATE2'</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 映射为自定义名称 </span>
  &#125;)
&#125;
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.CHANGE_STATE1(newVal)
<span class="hljs-comment">// 或者</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.myMutations(&#123; <span class="hljs-attr">num</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10</span> &#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-9">（4）actions</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>概念：</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>处理异步请求需要放在<code>actions</code>中</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>Action</code> 提交的是 <code>mutation</code>，而不是直接变更状态</p>
<ul>
<li>改变状态<code>state</code>只能通过<code>mutations</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Action 函数的参数是一个与 <code>store</code> 实例具有相同方法和属性的 <code>context</code> 对象</p>
<ul>
<li>通过这个 context 对象，可以调用当前store的属性和方法</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">actions: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">asyncChange1</span>(<span class="hljs-params">context, newVal</span>)</span> &#123;
        <span class="hljs-comment">// 模拟异步</span>
        <span class="hljs-built_in">setTimeout</span>(<span class="hljs-function">() =></span> &#123;
            context.commit(<span class="hljs-string">'CHANGE_STATE1'</span>, newVal);
        &#125;, <span class="hljs-number">1500</span>)
    &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 也可以将对象内部的属性和方法 通过解构的方式 进行使用</span>
    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-title">asyncChange2</span>(<span class="hljs-params">&#123; commit &#125;, payload</span>)</span> &#123;
        commit(<span class="hljs-string">"CHANGE_STATE2"</span>, payload);
    &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>使用：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 方式一：</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.$store.dispatch(<span class="hljs-string">'asyncChange1'</span>, newVal)

<span class="hljs-comment">// 方式二：使用 mapActions 辅助函数，将 actions 混入 methods 方法中</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> &#123; mapActions &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vuex'</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">methods</span>: &#123;
    ...mapActions([<span class="hljs-string">'asyncChange1'</span>])
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 指定别名</span>
    ...mapActions(&#123;
        <span class="hljs-attr">myActions</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'asyncChange2'</span>
  &#125;)
&#125;
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.asyncChange1(newVal)
<span class="hljs-comment">// 通过别名使用</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.myActions(&#123; <span class="hljs-attr">count</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10</span> &#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-10">（5）modules</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>概念</p>
<ul>
<li>使用单一状态树，应用的所有状态会集中到一个比较大的对象</li>
<li>当应用变得非常复杂时，store 对象就有可能变得相当臃肿</li>
<li>所以将 store 分割成模块（module）
<ul>
<li>每个模块拥有自己的 <code>state、mutations、actions、getters</code>，甚至是嵌套子模块，从上至下进行同样方式的分割</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 定义 moduleA</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> moduleA = &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">state</span>: &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">mutations</span>: &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">getters</span>: &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">actions</span>: &#123;&#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>使用</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> moduleA <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'./module/moduleA'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> store = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> Vuex.Store(&#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">modules</span>: &#123;
        moduleA <span class="hljs-comment">// moduleA中的所有属性都会被注册到全局中</span>
    &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">state</span>: &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">mutations</span>: &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">getters</span>: &#123;&#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">actions</span>: &#123;&#125;
&#125;)
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
